headline: The $1B Railroad Acquisition You Have Never Heard Of: FTAI Infrastructure's Earnings Review
summary: FTAI Infrastructure's core value lies in Transtar, its highly profitable rail asset. Read why I keep rating FIP stock as a Hold for now.
